form_info: The phone number has to contain only digits from 2 to 9, e.g 69394837 (0 and 1 do not contain phone word information)
form_invalid: Invalid number: Only integers from 2 to 9 are allowed
form_success: This is a valid phone number
list_default: Submit a Phone Number to display the list of its possible phone words
list_is_word: List of Phone Words for the number
